connector.description: Send data to AWS Comprehend for natural language processing.

camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.operat.name: camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.operation
camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.operat.description: The operation to perform on the input text.

camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.langua.name: camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.languageCode
camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.langua.description: The language code of the input text. Required for all operations except detectDominantLanguage. Use a 2-letter ISO 639-1 code (e.g., 'en' for English, 'es' for Spanish).

camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.endpoi.name: camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.endpointArn
camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.endpoi.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the endpoint to use for document classification. Required for classifyDocument operation.

camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.access.name: camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.accessKey
camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.access.description: The access key obtained from AWS.

camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.secret.name: camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.secretKey
camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.secret.description: The secret key obtained from AWS.

camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.useDef.name: camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.useDefaultCredentialsProvider
camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.useDef.description: If true, the Comprehend client loads credentials through a default credentials provider. If false, it uses the basic authentication method (access key and secret key).

camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.usePro.name: camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.useProfileCredentialsProvider
camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.usePro.description: Set whether the Comprehend client should expect to load credentials through a profile credentials provider.

camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.useSes.name: camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.useSessionCredentials
camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.useSes.description: Set whether the Comprehend client should expect to use Session Credentials. This is useful in a situation in which the user needs to assume an IAM role for doing operations in Comprehend.

camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.profil.name: camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.profileCredentialsName
camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.profil.description: If using a profile credentials provider this parameter sets the profile name.

camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.sessio.name: camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.sessionToken
camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.sessio.description: Amazon AWS Session Token used when the user needs to assume an IAM role.

camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.uriEnd.name: camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.uriEndpointOverride
camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.uriEnd.description: The overriding endpoint URI. To use this option, you must also select the `overrideEndpoint` option.

camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.overri.name: camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.overrideEndpoint
camel.kamelet.aws-comprehend-sink.overri.description: Select this option to override the endpoint URI. To use this option, you must also provide a URI for the `uriEndpointOverride` option.
